title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase and extend certain renewable energy and energy efficiency incentives.
content: Renewable Energy Assistance Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) eliminate the dollar limitation on the tax credit for residential energy efficiency property expenditures and extend such credit through 2016. (2) extend through 2016 the energy tax credit for solar energy and qualified fuel cell property. (3) allow public electric utility property to qualify for the energy tax credit. (4) extend through 2015 the tax credit for nonbusiness energy property. And (5) modify energy efficient appliance tax credit amounts for appliances produced after 2007.
